Securing Your Cold Fusion Server

18 Oct 1999

While checking into some Cold Fusion security issues, I ran across one of the most comprehensive listings of Cold Fusion security advisories on the Web.

Over at attrition.org they have a complete listing of security advisories about Cold Fusion that every person who uses Cold Fusion for their application server should read and take note of.

Thanks to the folks at attrition for providing a great resource.
